title: Christmas Movie Bingo
notes: Steam has only a few reviews (no score). SteamDB lists the app; tiny sample keeps score moderate. Steam store shows no user reviews; players use phones/tablets/laptops alongside the movie (separate screens).
raw_comment: Watch a Christmas movie. Start the game, each player gets a bingo card on their smartphone. Instead of numbers you have to notice something in the movie. 1-12 local players on smartphones.
